short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play games like Pong, Snake, and Dodger while you procrastinate on your homework!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you struggling to write a paper? Do you just want to give up? I can help with that! Play games like Pong, Snake, and Dodger without having to open a new browser! That way you can play games and still feel productive because your Google Docs is open just underneath!
